name: Carlos Sainz
description:
Prepare to run as Carlos Sainz (a famous Spanish rally driver) in the World Championship, driving your Toyota Celica. You'll run on Monte Carlo, Sweden, UK, Argentina, Spain... and more Championship circuits.

You can modify the car characteristics to better accommodate each circuit. You'll run on clay, asphalt, snow...
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, MSX | Combined View

shot.caption: There's a very brief screen that says 'Ziggurat presenta Carlos Sainz' and then the game loads to this

Option 3 brings up the game control menu.
The action key redefinition takes place on the same screen

Option 1 brings up the Game Menu
1 - Training
2 - Racing
3 - Lap times & rankings
Before the start the player has the chance to change the suspension and the tyres
Crash on the first corner! At speed the car is slides over the track very easily. Nice collision graphics - I'll see a lot of these
The black dot confused me for most of my first lap. At first I thought it was some sort of guide and tried to follow it. Its actually the shadow of a bird that flies over the course
Crashing causes damage to various parts if the car. Here the steering's down to 89% ....
... here the transmissions down to 69%. By the end of the lap the transmission was down below 9% but performance seemed unaffected
Nice touch showing the car leaving the ground as it crosses the railway lines
Its quite unspectacular but this is the finish line,
The game keeps two sets of times : Race times
After displaying the timings the game presents a car status screen before taking the player to the green Game menu
